metadata.description: Use the survey-wizard template as a foundation for your next Shiny app.

content.text: A simple survey wizard that simply writes responses to a file and displays a confirmation message when submitted. In this example, we use the shiny_validate package for input validation, providing direct feedback when the user enters invalid responses. We also make clever use of navset_hidden() to show/hide different steps of the form via action buttons.
